com.jaxio.celerio.configuration.convention

Class Renamer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jaxio.celerio.configuration.convention.Renamer

  • public class Renamer
extends java.lang.Object
    By default Celerio calculates Java field name based on the underlying column name.
    This setting allows you to change the column name that is passed to Celerio to calculate the default field name.
    You can for example remove well known prefix pattern from your column names.

      • Renamer

    • Method Detail

      • getRegexp

        public java.lang.String getRegexp()
        The regular expression to apply on the column name. For example, assuming you want to remove from all column names the prefix string that consists of 3 chars and a '_', you can use 'regexp="^.{3}_" replace=""' or 'regexp="^qrtz_" replace="Quartz_"'

      • getReplace

        public java.lang.String getReplace()
        The replacement String. For example, assuming you want to remove from all column names the prefix string that consists of 3 chars and a '_', you can use 'regexp="^.{3}_" replace=""' or 'regexp="^qrtz_" replace="Quartz_"'
